Author: Fieryirishplease
Text: As another commenter said you 100% can have clots bigger than a quarter. When I was in my teens I had them the size of a ping pong ball. Ow.   BUT I know where you are coming from and it is a scary, overwhelming thought. If you DO want to have children later on start planning now, super small steps. Certain extra vitamins, certain habits you want to get gone, and above all speak to a doctor. Scary? Fuck yes, but worth it. You may find some judgemental assholes but don't let that stop you, keep looking for a doctor that you can feel open with be it a GP or an OB/GYN.

Author: hallsofterris
